org.apache.hadoop.hdfs.server.datanode

Class DirectoryScanner

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.hadoop.hdfs.server.datanode.DirectoryScanner
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Runnable

    @InterfaceAudience.Private
public class DirectoryScanner
extends Object
implements Runnable
    Periodically scans the data directories for block and block metadata files. Reconciles the differences with block information maintained in the dataset.

      private static class  DirectoryScanner.ReportCompiler

      Tracks the files and other information related to a block on the disk Missing file is indicated by setting the corresponding member to null.
